thread.title: BRIEF-Banzai board appoints Pietro Scott Jovane director general
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Banzai board appoints Pietro Scott Jovane director general

title: BRIEF-Banzai board appoints Pietro Scott Jovane director general
text:
BRIEF-Banzai board appoints Pietro Scott Jovane director general 
Oct 16 Banzai SpA : 
* Board appoints Pietro Scott Jovane director general, effective as of Oct. 16 
* Board commits to appointing Pietro Scott Jovane CEO and Paolo Ainio executive chairman in the next shareholders' meeting, to take place on Nov. 25
